verses.verse: By night<WH3915> on my bed,<WH4904> I sought<WH1245> him whom my soul<WH5315> loves.<WH157> I sought<WH1245> him,<WH4672> but I didn't find him.

I will get up<WH6965> now,<WH5437> and go about the city;<WH5892> in the streets<WH7784> and in the squares<WH7784> I will seek<WH1245> him whom my soul<WH5315> loves.<WH157> I sought<WH1245> him,<WH4672> but I didn't find him.
The watchmen<WH8104> who go about<WH5437> the city<WH5892> found<WH4672> me;<WH7200> "Have you seen him whom my soul<WH5315> loves?<WH157>"

I had scarcely<WH4592> passed<WH5674> from them,<WH4672> when I found him whom my soul<WH5315> loves.<WH157> I held<WH270> him,<WH7503> and would not let him go, until I had brought<WH935> him into my mother<WH517>'s house,<WH1004> into the room<WH2315> of her who conceived me.<WH2029>

I adjure<WH7650> you,<WH1323> daughters of Jerusalem,<WH3389> by the roes,<WH6643> or<WH176> by the hinds<WH355> of the field,<WH7704> that you not stir up,<WH5782> nor awaken<WH5782> love,<WH160> until it so desires.<WH2654>

Who is this who comes<WH5927> up from the wilderness<WH4057> like pillars<WH8490> of smoke,<WH6227> perfumed<WH6999> with myrrh<WH4753> and frankincense,<WH3828> with all spices<WH81> of the merchant?<WH7402>
Behold,<WH8010> it is Solomon's carriage!<WH4296> Sixty<WH8346> mighty<WH1368> men are around<WH5439> it,<WH1368> of the mighty men of Israel.<WH3478>
They all handle<WH270> the sword,<WH2719> and are expert<WH3925> in war.<WH4421> Every man<WH376> has his sword<WH2719> on his thigh,<WH3409> because of fear<WH6343> in the night.<WH3915>
King<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> made<WH6213> himself a carriage<WH668> of the wood<WH6086> of Lebanon.<WH3844>

He made<WH6213> its pillars<WH5982> of silver,<WH3701> its bottom<WH7507> of gold,<WH2091> its seat<WH4817> of purple,<WH713> its midst<WH8432> being paved<WH7528> with love,<WH160> from the daughters<WH1323> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Go forth,<WH3318> you daughters<WH1323> of Zion,<WH6726> and see<WH7200> king<WH4428> Solomon,<WH8010> with the crown<WH5850> with which his mother<WH517> has crowned<WH5849> him,<WH3117> in the day of his weddings,<WH2861> in the day<WH3117> of the gladness<WH8057> of his heart.<WH3820> Lover
